content:
Hi, I pass all the tests, but I still don't understand well some points for the frame_maker and shift_maker functions:
1. when we call them to construct a Dataframe object in the make_dataframe function, who will pass the value to 2 parameters of the function defined in frame_maker and shift_maker?
2. when we return those 2 functions defined inside frame_maker and shift_maker, when will them be called?
subject: pset 4_functions return function
